text:
Hi All,
I am getting an error when I Create an Engagement by API with type CALL by restSharp Library
Error is here "{"status":"error",
"message":"null is not a valid type",
"correlationId":"51e14221-1da9-4d1a-a9b9-e18fd8c7ef05",
"requestId":"1ddb9f2508a91a152cddb194cb32b848"
}"

Hi Community,

I am trying to test out a webhook. Can someone provide insight into  on why this is not sending the post request to <http://webhook.site?https://share.vidyard.com/watch/Hrxj2badTxz4TotAPc88mt|webhook.site?https://share.vidyard.com/watch/Hrxj2badTxz4TotAPc88mt>?
Is the New Clients app installed in the portal where you made the salutation change?  Another way of saying installed, is did you go through the OAuth 2.0 flow in the test portal?
I'm a front-end developer, and I would like to learn a back-end programming language to start using the HubSpot API. Is there a language that is more designated for HubSpot API? thanks!
